item.title: No body is taking notice of diversion, 16th January
item.description:
Its now been going on so long trucks and throu traffic are no longer taking the diversion route this is not good enough
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, East End Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 16th January
item.description:
Tree is growing at a severe angle and is starting to grow in front of the church. It needs some to be supported by something or cut back, removed and replanted. Customer just needs something to be done with the tree as it seems to be causing some issues. More than one seem to be doing the same thing but one is worse than the others.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several pot holes on Woodlands Road/Salisbury Avenue, 16th January
item.description:
Several potholes on Woodlands Road/Salisbury Avenue,You try and avoid one and hit another. People are swerving them and nearly hitting oncoming traffic head on This can not wait till the road is resurfaced in march
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 114, Salisbury Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
